attributes.action: stop spending tax payer's money on giving methadone to drug addicts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is drug user's own choice to start taking drugs, therefore it should be their own choice to come off them. We, as clean living tax payers, should not foot the bill for them to do so. It should be our human right for our money not to be spent on these people.
